title: No Man's Sky Getting Massive Update - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.15.19
description:
Start your trial month of Hims for $5 at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

The Blind Gamer Steve Saylor joins Greg to talk about No Man's Sky Beyond announcement!

Time Codes - 
youtube.com/snowball
00:06:24 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:08:43 - No Man’s Sky’s Next DLC
00:14:48 - “Why is MMO a dirty word when it comes to games now?” - Dapper Stephen
00:22:50 - Sony Kills the Take Two Rumor
00:24:11 - Apex Scholarship
00:27:20 - Out today
00:32:46 -  Hims
Reader mail   -
00:33:50 - “This is in response to Greg's question yesterday of if I would buy Left 4 Dead today.” - The Nano Biologist
00:35:10 - “Left 4 Dead 2 was one of my sleepover games for a long time but…” - Weissmark
00:49:40 - “I saw on PSN that Judgement is available for Pre-order here in the states…” - Msg Heavy arms
00:50:29 - Squad Up: Tiz Teaches - Mental Health - www.checkpointorg.com
00:52:40 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Greg & Emma Kidwell
Tuesday - Greg & Dave Lang
Wednesday - Greg & Rebekah Valentine
Thursday - Greg & The Honorable, Honorable, HONORABLE COMMIIIISH
Friday - Greg & Amanda Farough
